verses.text: \w Again|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* four \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7223"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* had red \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*. \w The|strong="H7223"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* had \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*,

\w the|strong="H7992"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H7992"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w dappled|strong="H1261"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w*, \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord?”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* four \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w standing|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* country \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* west \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w dappled|strong="H1261"\w* \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w* country.”

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* strong horses \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w were|strong="H3318"\w* impatient \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w patrol|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth. \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w patrol|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth,” \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3318"\w* \w did|strong="H1980"\w* \w so|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* horses \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* country \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w quiet|strong="H5117"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* country.” Preparations for the Crowning of Zerubbabel

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* gifts \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w Heldai|strong="H2469"\w*, \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* come \w from|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H1121"\w* go \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w once|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*.

Tell \w him|strong="H8478"\w*: “\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*

d*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* Heldai \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Josiah \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*.
